Reviews.Content: No issues with the camera yet. I like the quality of the videos, pictures and size. Perfect to carry in your pockets or whatever. I took it on a adventure race I did recently and had no problems. Sweat, rain, and yes even under water and have had no problems. So far so good. Worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Camera
Reviews.Author: Cristina Parra Sanchez
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful extremely small camera. I guess the only con so far would be the price.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE CAMERA; HORRIBLE SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Ping Porsche
Reviews.Content: WHY CAN'T I GIVE NEGATIVE STARS?DON'T BUY THIS OR ANY OTHER SONY CAMERA!!!!!Sony makes crap cameras and their support will accuse you of breaking it.Purchase from a respectable camera maker like Canon, Nikon, or Fuji.I bought this for snorkeling and it corrupted my memory card on the first trip.OK, $10,000 trip with no pictures, because the camera corrupted the memory.Called Sony and they blamed the memory.Got two new memory cards for the next trip.OK, new trip, $5k trip with no pictures because the entire stupid camera craps out.Called Sony, no apologies, no emergency loaner, just a send it in with the receipt so we can verify it's still under warranty.Sent the camera in to the depot, on my own dime.They call and accused me of opening the camera door.What idiots! Why the hell would I do that? So I can ruin my pictures?  TWICE????!!!!!I contacted all the way up to national customer support.All idiots along the way.They didn't do a user test underwater.They just dunk it and say it's still WATER-RESISTANT, so it must be user error.F#$% OFF SONY!!!!Whatever you do, buy something else and save your money, this is a horrible product, that takes horrible pictures and is slow as mud, with a horrible touchscreen that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: How often do you drop your camera?
Reviews.Author: S. Krishna "Sam"
Reviews.Content: Are you always dropping your camera?  Are you planning on taking pictures of camels in the desert in the middle of a sand storm?  Do you love your camera so much that you'll like to go skinny dipping with it?  if you've answered 'no' to all the above questions, then move on.  This camera is not worth it.  Granted it takes great pictures in bright sunlight and it has lot of cool features.  But are they even usable?Yeah, its got great "night-shot" features, but what's the point if all pictures come out grainy and dull?  Not to mention totally out of balance in terms of color.  Its a great carry-around-everywhere camera, but that's where it ends.  Pictures out of it are almost the same out of a camera phone.  I have its much newer cousin, the hx9v and in that camera, those night-mode features are totally usable.  Unless you get this camera for say $50, I'd say don't even bother wasting money on it.  on the other hand, it might look cool sitting on a shelf and a great conversation piece if people have not seen such a tiny camera before.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Douglas M. Agra "Dagra"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use on my honeymoon in Polynesia but less than 30 days of use I had three problems with it: a) were entered water (not water-proof); b) let the black paint and c) the battery has problem. It was a disappointment because it had a problem just I was diving with sharks in Bora Bora island. I returned the product because I know that does not work. Do not recommend buying one because it is flawed.

Reviews.Title: Appareil très pratique
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: En achetant cette appareil photo je ne me suis pas trompé il est très compact et vraiment étanche. Je n'ais rien à dire de plus les photos sont super, c'est pas un reflex, mais pour partir en vacances au bord de la mer, c'est l'accessoire idéal.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but:
Reviews.Author: DLC "DLC"
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything it says it does and does it well.  The touch screen is easy to use, unfortunately almost impossible to see in daylight.  The move to remove view finders on these small cameras makes them very difficult to use outside.  The best you can do it point and pray.  Movies suck up the battery very fast but given what it's doing and the quality I'm ok with that.This was a replacement for a 10 year old Kodak digital and the Sony has more features, I don't think the quality is that much better.There is a lot of white light on faces on close shots with back light no matter how many different setting I try but am just learning so may find a happy setting to fix this.It's OK. Really need to find a solution to the LDC screen in daylight - extremely annoying.

Reviews.Title: Terrible, horrible, no good, very bad images.
Reviews.Author: mrlekgertner
Reviews.Content: There's so much to like about this camera...the wide angle Zeiss lens, the size, the rugged build and the waterproof enclosure.  It's also a breeze to use: fast and intuitive.  However, the camera delivers absolutely horrible images -- even in bright light and at the lowest ISOs, images look overprocessed and frankly like $%@p, even printed at 4x6.  I tried every possible setting--same results.  I'd been so excited about this camera, but it's a huge disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Excellent transaction
Reviews.Author: Annie Lin
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this transaction and will definitely do business with you guys again! Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Wow, but no-thanks.
Reviews.Author: Scott Knudsen
Reviews.Content: Being that my old Pentax water-proof camera was around 6 years old and I was going off on a extended vacation out of country I decided to go shopping for a new water-proof camera.I did my research and read all the reviews on all the different companies models and found that there is no water-proof camera that will stand up to being submerged for very long. All the different brands have their issues when it comes to water-proof cameras.So off to the dealer I went. I tried a bunch of different brands out, and instantly fell in love with this Sony camera after trying it. It shots amazingly fast photos, and can do amazing things with them that lots of DSLR's cannot even do. I also really loved the touch screen panel. This camera has so much going for it, and I tried really hard to justify buying it, yet I decided against it. Why? Because the way it is made would cause durability issues for me. My first complaint is its smooth slippery body which will easily slip out of a person hand, especially a wet hand. Second, is that it has a lens cover that slides back and forth. I work around heavy equipment and dust and sand gets in everything and this sliding lens cover would scratch everything to pieces. Third, its a Sony. I have never had any Sony products last for more than a couple of years.I really wanted to buy this camera, yet settled on a Pentax W90 which also has known issues, but is so much more durable. (Carry it in a Lowepro Ridge 20)Be warned, these little water-proof point and shoot cameras all have their problems (water-proofness, picture quality, speed), so don't expect too much from them. But of course having a camera with you, you will at least capture the image. And these cameras will stand up to lots of abuse, compared to a normal one. If your going to submerge one of these cameras on a vacation, make sure someone else has a camera along for backup.There should be no bad reviews on a product like this if they are designed properly, so I would highly encourage you to take the rest of the bad reviews seriously. You to Sony!

Reviews.Title: Excelent for the most of the people
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Lara
Reviews.Content: Yo no soy un experto en fotografía digital, pero si un usuario exigente. Yo la he utilizado en modo Intelligent Auto y creo que la mayoría de las personas la usarán así.Lo mejor:- Liviana y pequeña. Su diseño la hace muy cómoda de usar y llevar.- Excelente gran angular para el tamaño.- Excelente capacidad para tomar fotos sin flash en la oscuridad.- Excelente calidad de construcción. Made in Japan.- Aunque monofónica, tiene una buena calidad de sonido. No saturó el audio aun en un concierto con alto nivel de ruido.Lo peor:- La batería dura poco si se usa intensivamente el flash.- Viene sin memoria.- Debe abrir dos frágiles tapas plásticas cada vez que desea conectarla al PC.- En días soleados no es posible distinguir nada en el visor touch.- Pésimo o no existente estabilizador de imágenes para filmaciones.- Las fotos muchas veces quedan sobre expuestas o los colores no son totalmente naturales, sobre todo si se usa flash.Conclusión:Es una buena cámara para llevar siempre consigo, a todas partes y tomar fotos de calidad media rápidamente y cualquier condición.

Reviews.Title: Pequeña gran camara.
Reviews.Author: VIVIANA REYES ALARCON
Reviews.Content: Un tamaño muy conveviente para llevarla siempre en el bolso o cartera. Tiene muchas opciones para configurarla, toma muy lindas fotografias y graba muy buenos videos. Solo me falta probarla bajo el agua

Reviews.Title: preorder
Reviews.Author: Ray88
Reviews.Content: hello this product is stated for preorder in sonystyle US. why its not set for preorder at least in here??
